thread.title: Work for equality 'far from finished': Loretta Lynch's final speech from 16th Street Baptist Church
thread.title_full: Work for equality 'far from finished': Loretta Lynch's final speech from 16th Street Baptist Church

author: Ashley Remkus | aremkus@al.com
title: Work for equality 'far from finished': Loretta Lynch's final speech from 16th Street Baptist Church
text: "Yes, these are challenging times and yes we undoubtedly have more challenges to come," said Attorney General Loretta Lynch. "But many of our greatest strides, in equal rights, in human rights, in civil rights have come after some of our most heartbreaking losses."
